sentences.en: Agricultural subsidies absorb about half the EU's income.
sentences.cn: 农业补贴占去了欧盟收入的大约一半.

sentences.en: Animals absorb foods into their bodies.
sentences.cn: 动物把食物吸收到身体里.

sentences.en: He must subdue her, absorb her, rip her apart and consume her.
sentences.cn: 他立意要征服她, 吞了她, 不惜把她撕碎把她榨干.

sentences.en: His ability to absorb bits of disconnected information was astonishing.
sentences.cn: 他吸收利用互不相关的零碎信息的能耐惊人。

sentences.en: His mind was like a sponge, ready to absorb anything.
sentences.cn: 他的脑子跟海绵似的，什么都能吸收。

sentences.en: Large nations shouldn't absorb smaller ones.
Plants absorb carbon dioxide from the air and moisture from the soil.
sentences.cn: 植物从空气中吸收二氧化碳并从土壤中汲取水分。

sentences.en: Plants absorb nutrients from the soil.
sentences.cn: 植物从土壤中吸收养分。

sentences.en: Steel barriers can bend and absorb the shock.
sentences.cn: 钢制栅栏可以弯曲并能吸收冲击力。

sentences.en: The banks would be forced to absorb large losses.
sentences.cn: 银行将被迫承受巨大的损失。

sentences.en: The material can absorb outward-going radiation from the Earth.
sentences.cn: 该物质可以吸收地球向外辐射的能量。

sentences.en: The movement and noise of the machines absorbed him completely.
sentences.cn: 机器的运转和声响把他完全吸引住了。

sentences.en: The societies of the Highlands were able to absorb these changes.
sentences.cn: 苏格兰高地各社区能够承受这些变化.

sentences.en: This kind of paper does not absorb ink.

sentences.cn: 我们负担不起那些费用。

words.tran_cn: 可吸收的；容易被吸收的
吸收能力；吸收性；吸墨性；[物化] 吸光率
吸收；全神贯注，专心致志
吸收；使全神贯注（absorb的过去分词形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 集中精力做某事；全神贯注于

trans.tran_cn: 吸收，理解，掌握，合并，同化，消减，缓冲，经受住，使全神贯注
trans.tran_en: to take in liquid, gas, or another substance from the surface or space around something
to take in liquid, gas, or another substance from the surface or space around something
